channel.title: Hugo on Gary Larson
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Gary Larson

item.title: Produce a Python blog post with figures
item.description: Export from ipython notebook as a markdown file. The result will be a .zip file containing the .md file and images for the figures. By default these images’ filenames have output as the prefix. If I can figure out how to set a custom prefix, those following steps which involve file renaming will be moot. Move the .md file to garylarson.github.io-builder/content/post/ or other relevant subfolder of .../content/. For most posts this will be the post folder.
